timeline.message:
[MOB-1157] - Retain data for during configuration change

Globally saves urlCallBack and location.
Retains if the view is going to reload. If not it will assign the stored variable to null.

timeline.bodyText: This assigns the static variables before the checks that follow. It is possible that the callback will be assigned, but no in-app message will get spawned. I think it might be better to move these variables to IterableInAppFragmentHTMLNotification class instead and pass them through createInstance...
